## Description
Implement comprehensive analytics and reporting features for teachers and admins.

## Features

### Teacher Analytics
- Class performance overview
- Individual student progress tracking
- Question difficulty analysis
- Time-to-completion statistics
- Common wrong answers identification
- Performance trends over time
- Comparative analysis between tests

### Admin Analytics
- System-wide usage statistics
- User activity metrics
- Test creation and completion rates
- Subject popularity trends
- Performance by subject/difficulty
- Student retention metrics

### Reporting
- Export results to CSV/Excel
- PDF report generation
- Customizable date ranges
- Filterable by subject, difficulty, student, class
- Visual charts and graphs (using Chart.js or similar)
- Scheduled report delivery via email

## Priority
Medium

## Category
Feature - Analytics

## Labels
enhancement, feature, analytics, reporting
